inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: fluid analysis was consistent with Burkitt's lymphoma

inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pathology confirmed by treating institution s Pathology Department
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: pericardial fluid was kappa light chain restricted CD10 positive monotypic B cells expressing FMC-7, CD19, CD20, and myc rearrangement consistent with Burkitt's Lymphoma

inclusion.criterion: No prior treatment except patients may be entered if they have had prior limited-field radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability of patient or durable power of attorney (DPA) for healthcare to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient presented with symptoms and was treated

inclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B + patients may be enrolled at the discretion of the investigator
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inadequate renal function, defined as serum Cr > 1.5 or creatinine clearance < 50ml/min/1.73m2 unless lymphoma related
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inadequate hepatic or hematological function: as follows, unless lymphoma-/disease-related
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The effects of EPOCH-R on the developing human fetus are unknown. For this reason and because chemotherapy agents are known to be teratogenic
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: female subject of child-bearing potential not willing to use an acceptable method of birth control

exclusion.criterion: History of a prior invasive malignancy in past 5 years
exclusion.label: not_met
